hero.eyebrow: For people re-entering after a pause
hero.title: Return to paid work without abandoning your boundaries
hero.subtitle: We rebuild confidence, pace and routines so your comeback fits the season you are in.

card.title: Return-to-work clarity
card.description: Map your first 90 days with calm pacing and confident language.
benefits: Rebuild confidence after caregiving, study, or health leave.
Test paced experiments before you commit.
Set routines that protect energy and shared commitments.

key_points.title: Who this serves
key_points.description: People navigating layered responsibilities while stepping back into paid roles.

items.title: Caregivers balancing labour
items.description: You want to re-enter without erasing the care rhythms that still rely on you.

items.title: Professionals reskilling
items.description: You are translating refreshed skills into an industry story that makes sense.

items.title: Returners healing from burnout
items.description: You need gentle accountability so recovery is not traded for speed.

process.title: How the process works
process.description: A three to four month container with 60-minute sessions and light touch check-ins between calls.

steps.title: Orientation & consent
steps.description: We map responsibilities, non-negotiables and what support looks like to you.

steps.title: Design paced experiments
steps.description: We test options, practise scripts and rehearse conversations you want to lead.

steps.title: Embed routines that protect energy
steps.description: We build tracking rituals so you can sustain momentum without overextending.

process.note: Optional asynchronous feedback through voice notes or docs helps you integrate between sessions.

boundaries.title: Boundaries & consent
boundaries.description: We work transparently so you stay in charge of pace and disclosure.

items.question: Who controls what is shared?
items.answer: You choose what information travels. We never pass details to employers without explicit consent.

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. We watch for trauma triggers and signpost specialist care when healing work is needed.

items.question: What if work demands breach capacity?
items.answer: We pause to co-create a safer action plan before continuing if commitments start to harm health.

items.question: Can my employer pay for this programme?
items.answer: Often yes. We establish confidentiality agreements before any sponsor involvement.

items.question: Do we work on CVs or interview prep?
items.answer: We practise narratives, run mock conversations and review materials when it supports your goal.

items.question: What if I need a slower pace?
items.answer: We can stretch the cadence or shift to lighter touch support during intense care seasons.

cta.title: Ready to return with steadiness?
cta.description: Book a short chemistry call so we can understand your timeline and the support you need right now.
